attributes.action: Add the words "fortnite" and "gamer" to the dictionary
attributes.additional_details: Fortnite is a very popular game and over 63% of people worldwide identify as gamers
attributes.background: Gaming and fortnite has become an undeniable part of British culture. Therefore, the most respectable thing the UK government could to commemorate  these such pillars of UK culture is to add the words "gamer" and "fortnite" to the dictionary. Doing so would help to end gamer discrimination as well.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the Government is not responsible for adding words to the dictionary. This would be the responsibility of the dictionary publisher.
